<p><object data="http://www.twitch.tv/swflibs/TwitchPlayer.swf" height="378" id="clip_embed_player_flash" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" width="420"><param name="movie" value="http://www.twitch.tv/swflibs/TwitchPlayer.swf"><param name="allowScriptAccess" value="always"><param name="allowNetworking" value="all"><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"><param name="flashvars" value="channel=earthworm_slim&auto_play=false&start_volume=25&videoId=c5748166&device_id=f268e867e0b4eff2"></object><br/>No chutes. No lander legs. <a href="http://www.twitch.tv/earthworm_slim/profile"><strong>EARTHWORM_SLIM</strong></a> attempts a Duna landing in style and no, we don’t mean his pilot outfit, either.</p>

<p></p>

You're not getting anywhere with 600 m/s. XD

I suppose it was just a lander, though.
